text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So, with that, we've officially kicked off our prep camp for 
the Festival of Illustrious Equines ——

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Phew. Damn… Still lacking.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian! There you are.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Rudolf… What do you want? There's still some time 
before our archery practice, isn't there?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Well, if you can get ready 
in a flash then yes, there's time…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Then I will. Leave me alone.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Kikka Sho, Autumn Tenno Sho, Japan Cup, Arima Kinen… 
These exhilarating races are right around the corner yet 
here I am, wasting my time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: If I don't at least hone my skills, I won't be able to keep up…!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian…………

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
—— Alright, great work today, everyone! 
Let's wrap it up here.

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Curren, your movements have improved significantly. 
And Ms. Yukino, try to relax your shoulders a bit more.

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Especially when you step out into the center for the solo. 
That is the moment of peak excitement, so make sure to 
enjoy it yourself as well.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Y-Yes ma'am…! I'll practice even harder to really enjoy it…!

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
As for you, Ms.City… Well, I think your dance 
is very beautiful… however……

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: However……?

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Hmm…… No, it's nothing. My apologies. 
I think your dance is wonderful as it is!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Okay. If it looks "pretty" then that's good.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes… mhm, so the paperwork for the night outing 
is sorted then. Thanks for handling it on the double, 
Air Groove. Talk to you later ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ms. President, uhm～ 
… Oops! Sorry!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
No problem, I just finished my call. 
Do you need something?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Weeell, I don't think it's a huge issue personally～ but ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
—— Hmm, some tension in the Votive Dance team, huh? 
Thank you for letting me know, Curren Chan.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As a matter of fact, I had been planning something relevant to 
this topic. Arrangements were completed a moment ago.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Whoa, really?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That's right. I will talk Brian into it one way or another, but I 
would like your help with Gold City and Yukino Bijin ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
—— Wowee～ they even have fireworks! 
This festival lives up to its reputation～!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: It's a big deal in this area according to the innkeeper. …… Mmm, those food stalls smell amazing.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
B-But… can we really go gallivanting around 
a festival when we's here ta practice?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
One must walk before running, Yukino Bijin. We are tasked 
with creating a festival where everyone can feel content. 
Experiencing this for ourselves is invaluable. Come ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Brian, which stall do you want to start with? I'm curious about 
the local specialties, personally. We should get some souvenirs 
for the student council members back home too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Even though you only came after finishing more than 
enough work to cover the entire duration of the camp? 
… Anyway, I'm starving. Food first.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
That stall's colorful lanterns are so cute! Their light is so 
soft too… if I stand here peeking back a little… get a good 
view of the scenery… Yep, that'd make a great pic♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Haha…… I agree. I'll take one for you later, Curren. 
What about you, Yukino? Any stalls you want to check out?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Uhmm, I'm thinking I want ta have a go at the yo-yo fishing…… 
Uh, no, that's a bit childish huh, ahaha……!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why not? Yo-yos can be really cute. Plus, I think 
it suits you, Yukino. I'll snap a pic of you too.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Thank you so much…!!

text_block_list.name: Local Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
E-Excuse me! You're Curren, right? Sorry to interrupt…! 
Ah, I uh… follow you on Umasta!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wow, thank you～!! I'm glad you approached me♪

text_block_list.name: Local Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
You're practicing for the Festival of Illustrious Equine's 
Votive Dance… right? I super duper can't wait to see 
your performance～! I'll definitely be there!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Awesome, I'll see you there! Oh, and share your thoughts with 
#Curren #VotiveDance♪ I'll be looking through later☆

text_block_list.name: Local Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Got it～! I'll help make sure it trends! Sorry to bother you 
during your private time and thank you～!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Your Votive Dance posts have really gone viral, Curren.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
The reactions seem to vary, probably because it's a bit off 
from my usual image. But overall, the response has been 
on the positive side, so I'm happy♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I think I've managed my part this time～

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Your part?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Mmlike, role maybe? I saw myself as the mascot for this. 
Since history and tradition aren't exactly part of my image.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So I focused on what I know; generating buzz and trying to 
reach a broad audience, but while keeping a serious approach 
to the dance itself. That can be the "unexpected" side of me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I thought that would be most appealing♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: … I see. You're really something.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: And I mean that…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, this aroma is irresistible! The smell of burning sauce is unmatched. Shall we try some yakisoba next, Brian? If we track the sauce of this smell ——

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
No thanks. ……Not enough meat. 
That won't even warm me up.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmm, is that sauce? Then let's head over there. They had a variety of skewers. We'll find something to satisfy you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Tch… What's all this pampering about? Are you trying to be my older sister?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Not at all. I'm no match for Biwa Hayahide in that regard.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I simply want you to enjoy yourself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian, let yourself enjoy the moment. In this festival, in the Festival of Illustrious Equines… and in our Yabusame.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's all I ask.
